sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-card class="mx-auto" outlined>
		<v-list-item-title class="headline pa-2 grey lighten-3">{{ header }}</v-list-item-title>
		<v-container class="py-0">
			<v-row>
				<v-col cols="4" class="pa-0" v-for="(subtopic, index) in subtopics" :key="index">
					<v-hover v-slot:default="{ hover }" open-delay="10" >
						<v-card  :elevation="hover ? 6 : 2" class="mx-auto pa-2" style="min-height: 100%" outlined :to="`/Topic/${subtopic.subtopic_url}`" append>
							<v-responsive>
								<v-img :src="require(`@/assets/${subtopic.img}`)" aspect-ratio="1"></v-img>
							</v-responsive>
							<v-card-subtitle class="text-center">{{ subtopic.subtopicTitle }}</v-card-subtitle>
						</v-card>
					</v-hover>
				</v-col>
			</v-row>
		</v-container>
	</v-card> <!-- end of #timePeriods -->
</template>

<script>
export default {
	name: 'timePeriods',
	components: { 
		// topicComponents //translated to topic-components tage
	},
	props: {
		header: String,
		subtopics: Array
	},
	data (){
		return{
			logo: "logo.png"
		}
	},
	computed:{
		subtopicsInThrees() {
			return this._.chunk(this.subtopics, 3);
		}
	}
}
</script>
